Title: Ex Mach Tina
Writer: Gregory Thompson, Greg Thompson, Loren Bouchard (created by), Loren Bouchard (developed by), Jim Dauterive (developed by)
Actors: H. Jon Benjamin, Dan Mintz, Eugene Mirman, Larry Murphy
Plot: After hurting her ankle, Tina enrolls in a program that enables her send a robot of herself to school and the robot gives her an unexpected breakthrough with Jimmy Jr.
